name: Indian Jade
description:
The Indian Jade Chakrub is made from pure green aventurine, a crystal that has been used for thousands of years to assist:

Attract opportunity
Release old patterns
Bring optimism and zest for life
Enhance creativity
Sooth brutal temperaments
Diminish the effects of domestic strife between spouses
Encourages love later in life

When the energy of the crystal combines with your own sexual energy, expect your chakras to light up, your heart to open, and your body to become more sensitive to subtle sexual energy.

This is a 7'' long, and 1-1.5'' wide Chakrub. Color and size variations may occur because they are hand shaped and made out of pure green aventurine.
 
*all sales final

name: The Onyx
description:
Black Onyx is a stone that aids in overcoming past relationships. It guards against negativity and helps create emotional stability. Black Onyx aids sexual health and self control and relates to the root chakra, ovaries, womb and menses. Black Onyx has been used for centuries to assist:

In overcoming past relationships
Guard against negativity
Help create emotional stability
Sexual health and self control
Absorb and transforms negative energy
Ease the root chakra, ovaries, womb and menses

When the energy of the crystal combines with your own sexual energy, expect your chakras to light up, your heart to open, and your body to become more sensitive to subtle sexual energy.

This is a 7'' long, and 1-1.5'' wide Chakrub. Color and size variations may occur because they are hand shaped and made out of pure black onyx.

 *All sales final
